
{{alias}}( value, property )
    Returns a property descriptor for an object's own property.

    If provided `null` or `undefined` or provided a non-existent property, the
    function returns `null`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Input value.

    property: string|symbol
        Property name.

    Returns
    -------
    desc: Object|null
        Property descriptor.

    Examples
    --------
    > var obj = { 'a': 'b' };
    > var desc = {{alias}}( obj, 'a' )
    {...}

    See Also
    --------
